channel.title: Need a classpath?
channel.description:
im getting an error when i try to load this
[code]Error: loaderror Starting up 20 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method8(client.java:4591) at Applet_Sub1.method3(Applet_Sub1.java:146) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:140) at client.run(client.java:4371) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
and im using these pathes
class path - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
path - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
so im getting an error message my latest jdk updates jdk6u1 jdk6u7 jdk5.. a few others idk if those matter but anyways is there a better or new classpath or path i should put in?ty
